name: Min'han
culture_notes: speaks Riveric Dialects with island loanwords
dockside offerings to ancestors and tides
cuisine: smoked riverfish and kelp stews
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind-control institutions; instant resurrection banned
notes: tech level: near-medieval to early industrial with local ritual magic
population data unknown; functions as small river/coastal outpost
